verses.verse: In the <S%H8337>six<s%> and <S%H7970>thirtieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H609>Asa,<s%> <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> <S%H4438>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> <S%H1115>that<s%> he might not <S%H5414>allow<s%> anyone to go <S%H3318>out<s%> or come <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

Then <S%H609>Asa<s%> brought <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> out of the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> and of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> to Ben <S%H1130>Hadad<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> at <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Let there be a <S%H1285>treaty<s%> between me and <S%H1>you,<s%> as there was between my father and your <S%H1>father.<s%> <S%H7971>Behold,<s%> I have sent you <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold.<s%> <S%H3212>Go,<s%> <S%H6565>break<s%> your <S%H1285>treaty<s%> with <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that he may depart from <S%H5927>me.<s%>"

Ben <S%H1130>Hadad<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H609>Asa,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of his <S%H2428>armies<s%> against the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and they <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5859>Ijon,<s%> and <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> and Abel <S%H66>Maim,<s%> and all the <S%H4543>storage<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali.<s%>
It <S%H1201>happened,<s%> when Baasha <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H2308>it,<s%> that he left off <S%H1129>building<s%> <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> and let his <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H7673>cease.<s%>

Then <S%H609>Asa<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> all <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and they carried <S%H5375>away<s%> the <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> and its <S%H6086>timber,<s%> with which <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> had <S%H1129>built;<s%> and he built therewith <S%H1387>Geba<s%> and <S%H4709>Mizpah.<s%>

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H2607>Hanani<s%> the <S%H7200>seer<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8172>him,<s%> "Because you have relied on the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria,<s%> and have not <S%H8172>relied<s%> on <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> therefore is the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H4422>escaped<s%> out of your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H3569>Weren't<s%> the Ethiopians and the <S%H3864>Lubim<s%> a <S%H7230>huge<s%> <S%H2428>army,<s%> with <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H7235>many?<s%> <S%H8172>Yet,<s%> because you relied on <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> he <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

For the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> run back and <S%H7751>forth<s%> throughout the whole <S%H776>earth,<s%> to show himself <S%H2388>strong<s%> in the behalf of them whose <S%H3824>heart<s%> is <S%H8003>perfect<s%> toward <S%H5528>him.<s%> Herein you have done foolishly; for from <S%H6258>henceforth<s%> you shall <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H4421>wars.<s%>"

Then <S%H609>Asa<s%> was <S%H3707>angry<s%> with the <S%H7200>seer,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> him in the <S%H4115>prison;<s%> <S%H1004><s%> for he was in a <S%H2197>rage<s%> with him because of this <S%H609>thing.<s%> Asa <S%H7533>oppressed<s%> some of the <S%H5971>people<s%> at the same <S%H6256>time.<s%>

<S%H1697>Behold,<s%> the acts of <S%H609>Asa,<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%> and <S%H314>last,<s%> <S%H3789>behold,<s%> they are written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

In the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H8672>ninth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4438>reign<s%> <S%H609>Asa<s%> was <S%H2456>diseased<s%> in his <S%H7272>feet;<s%> his <S%H2483>disease<s%> was <S%H4605>exceeding<s%> <S%H2483>great:<s%> yet in his disease he <S%H1875>didn't<s%> seek <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> but to the <S%H7495>physicians.<s%>
<S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H259>one<s%> and <S%H705>fortieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign.<s%>

They <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in his own <S%H6913>tombs,<s%> which he had <S%H3738>dug<s%> out for himself in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H7901>laid<s%> him in the <S%H4904>bed<s%> which was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with sweet <S%H1314>odors<s%> and various <S%H2177>kinds<s%> of spices <S%H7543>prepared<s%> by the <S%H4842>perfumers<s%>' <S%H4639>art:<s%> and they <S%H8313>made<s%> a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> burning for <S%H8316>him.<s%>
